reviewComments: Booked SUP via Groupon. Arrived and was greeted by friendly informative staff. Drove down to dock and picked up equipment. Staff very attentive. It was our first time to... read more
Easy to find on the quieter side of the lake, but still close to get to from Big Bear City. Nice and friendly staff. Quick onto the water. Well maintained equipment.
We got lost in the wilderness and loved the adventure. Every turn brought new views and each new dirt path led u somewhere you hadn't seen. It was great!!!
